sentences.sContent: Courses include Latin, paleography, as well as courses in the history and literature of these periods.
sentences.sContent_eng: Courses include Latin, paleography, as well as courses in the history and literature of these periods.
sentences.sCn: 课程包括拉丁语、古文字学和那些时期的历史文学。

sentences.sContent: On the basis of philological and paleography evidence, he concluded its date is about the end of the third century A.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the basis of philological and paleography evidence, he concluded its date is about the end of the third century A.
sentences.sCn: 基于语言学和古文书学证据，他推论它的日期大约是公元后第三世纪末。
